code: import{verify,verifyerror}from"../../types";export var verifyAction=function verifyAction(){return{type:verify};};export var verifyError=function verifyError(){return{type:verifyerror};};var URL="https://motion.propulsion-home.ch/backend/api/auth/registration/validation/";export var verifyFunction=function verifyFunction(data){return function(dispatch){var config={method:'PATCH',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};fetch(URL,config).then(function(response){if(response.ok){dispatch(verifyAction());}else{dispatch(verifyError());response.json().then(function(object){var errorArray=Object.values(object);var errorStr='';for(var i=0;i<errorArray.length;i++){errorStr=errorStr+"\r\n "+errorArray[i];};alert("Error: "+errorStr);});}});};};
